view

Class ConsoleView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.View
      • view.ConsoleView

  • public class ConsoleView
extends View
    ConsoleView is a View that provides input/output via the console and is backed by a controller implementation. ConsoleView provides methods that allow Controller implementations to notify users of details.
    Author:
    YingHao
